TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is an NORP national , who was born in DATE and currently lives in GPE , GPE . The application was introduced by the applicant ’s wife , PERSON , on his behalf . The respondent Government are represented by Mr PERSON , Deputy ORG - Secretary , ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant arrived in GPE from GPE in DATE as a tourist . He has lived there ever since , although he never obtained a residence permit . In DATE he married a NORP national . CARDINAL children have been born of the marriage .

On DATE ORG convicted the applicant of attempted murder on account of the fact that , in the course of a quarrel , he had stabbed a Mr A. He was sentenced to DATE imprisonment and to expulsion from GPE on his release from prison . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment .

Subsequent to his early release from prison , on DATE ORG of ORG ordered that the applicant be expelled and banned from the territory of GPE for a DATE period . The territorial ban was made under LAW no . DATE on ORG . He unsuccessfully lodged an objection against the ban with ORG .
On DATE the applicant ’s petition for a pardon was turned down by the President of the Republic . On DATE ORG ordered the immediate enforcement of the expulsion order .
On DATE the President of the Republic pardoned the applicant in respect of the territorial ban .
The applicant ’s wife submitted that , notwithstanding this pardon , no residence permit has ever been issued to the applicant .

On DATE the Government informed the ORG that – despite the grant of a pardon removing any legal obstacles to the issue of a residence permit DATE the applicant had failed to request a permit from the competent GPE and GPE Regional Directorate of ORG . Meanwhile , criminal proceedings have been instituted against the applicant on charges of drug abuse . In this connection , a ‘ certificate of temporary GPE , to be renewed DATE , has been issued to the applicant ex officio pending his trial . A bill of indictment was preferred on DATE .

On DATE the Registry invited the applicant to comment on the ORG ’s submissions . This letter was received at the applicant ’s address against signature on DATE . There has been no communication with the Registry from the applicant ever since .
